tests.name: comment
tests.template: Hello, {# this is a comment #} World!

tests.name: no trailing hash
tests.template: Hello, {# this is not a comment } World!
tests.result: Hello, {# this is not a comment } World!

tests.name: commented markup
tests.template: Hello, {# this is {% if %} a {{ comment }} #} World!

tests.name: whitespace control
tests.template:
Hello,   {#- this is a comment -#}
World!
